ModMetaData.name: Posthuman Drift: Bossaps Xenotype
ModMetaData.author: Xylthixlm
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Bossaps xenotype and associated genes.\n\nBossaps were engineered as sentient livestock by the gene-artisans of a glitterworld best left forgotten. When things are peaceful they are calm and mild-mannered. But when they're hurt, instinct takes over, and they charge their enemies like a raging bull.
